soot.toDex

Class DexArrayInitDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.toDex.DexArrayInitDetector

  • public class DexArrayInitDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Detector class that identifies array initializations and packs them into a single instruction: a = new char[2]; a[0] = 42; a[1] = 3; In dex, this can be expressed in a more concise way: a = new char[2]; fill(a, ...)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs packed array initializations from the individual element assignments in the given body

      Fixes the traps in the given body to account for assignments to individual array elements being replaced by a single fill instruction.

      • constructArrayInitializations

        public void constructArrayInitializations(Body body)
        Constructs packed array initializations from the individual element assignments in the given body
        Parameters:
        body - The body in which to look for element assignments

      • getValuesForArrayInit

        public java.util.List<Value> getValuesForArrayInit(Unit arrayInit)

      • getIgnoreUnits

        public java.util.Set<Unit> getIgnoreUnits()

      • fixTraps

        public void fixTraps(Body activeBody)
        Fixes the traps in the given body to account for assignments to individual array elements being replaced by a single fill instruction. If a trap starts or ends in the middle of the replaced instructions, we have to move the trap.
        Parameters:
        activeBody - The body in which to fix the traps
